Title: Relates to rules regarding unattended motor vehicles
Summary: Provides an exception to the requirement that no person shall permit a vehicle to stand unattended without first stopping the engine, if a remote car starter is being used while away from the vehicle to engage the vehicle's climate controls.
LawCode: Amd ยง1210, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to rules regarding unattended motor vehicles
